```{r}
library(raster)

```

```{r}
bands <- stack("UVVR_Landsat_Bands.tif") 
bands

nlayers(bands)
```

```{r}
class("B7")

```


```{r}
summary(bands, maxsamp = ncell(bands))
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
str(bands_df)
```
